abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Global
            Environmental Facility (GEF) Sustainable Transport and Air
            Quality Project for Argentina is to assist participant
            cities in: (a) reducing greenhouse gases (GHG) emissions by
            increasing use of less energy intensive transport modes in
            cities; and (b) inducing policy changes in favor of
            sustainable transport projects. Under this level two
            restructuring, the closing date of the project will be
            extended from December 31, 2013 until October 31, 2014. This
            extension will take into account the following activities:
            (i) delays in grant effectiveness resulted in the late
            completion of grant financed investments; (ii) delays in
            implementation as a consequence of the internal
            restructuring process of the project implementing unit
            (PIU); (iii) the need to dismiss key projects delayed
            disbursements; and (iv) the need for more time to develop a
            key project in Posadas.
